aircraft.value: Banshee Fast - AC-7117-228 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Exhaust gas temperature margin reduction. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Exhaust System component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 29/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 02/07/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 04/07/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 03/07/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 07/07/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
